description.zh-cn: 一个由120个国家组成的国际组织，成员国之间不正式结盟以及反对任何国家集团。它成立的目的是为了在冷战背景下促进和维护发展中国家的利益。
description.en: An international organization of 120 countries that are not formally aligned with or against any major power bloc. It was founded with the purpose of advancing the interests of developing countries in the context of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 南斯拉夫总统，不结盟运动的主要创始人和首任秘书长之一。
description.en: President of Yugoslavia, one of the main founders and the first Secretary-General of the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 印度首任总理，不结盟运动的主要创始人之一。
description.en: The first Prime Minister of India and one of the main founders of the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 埃及第二任总统，不结盟运动的主要创始人之一。
description.en: The second President of Egypt and one of the main founders of the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 加纳首任总统，不结盟运动的创始人之一。
description.en: The first President of Ghana and one of the founders of the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚首任总统，不结盟运动的创始人之一。
description.en: The first President of Indonesia and one of the founders of the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 指美国和苏联及它们各自的盟友（即西方集团和东方集团）之间在第二次世界大战结束后的政治和军事紧张时期。
description.en: A period of political and military tension after World War II between powers in the Western Bloc (the United States, its NATO allies and others) and powers in the Eastern Bloc (the Soviet Union and its satellite states).

description.zh-cn: 1955年在印度尼西亚万隆举行的一次亚非国家会议，其商定的原则为不结盟运动的成立奠定了基础。
description.en: A conference of Asian and African states held in Bandung, Indonesia, in 1955, whose agreed-upon principles laid the foundation for the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 南斯拉夫首都，1961年第一次不结盟运动峰会的举办地。
description.en: Capital of Yugoslavia, host city of the first Non-Aligned Movement summit in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 冷战期间由苏联领导的中欧和东欧共产主义国家集团。
description.en: The group of communist states of Central and Eastern Europe, led by the Soviet Union, during the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 冷战期间由美国领导的资本主义国家集团，与东方集团对立。
description.en: The group of capitalist countries led by the United States during the Cold War, in opposition to the Eastern Bloc.

description.zh-cn: 冷战时期的超级大国，领导东方集团。
description.en: A superpower during the Cold War that led the Eastern Bloc.

description.zh-cn: 冷战时期的超级大国，领导西方集团。
description.en: A superpower during the Cold War that led the Western Bloc.

description.zh-cn: 古巴革命领导人及政治家，曾在不结盟运动中发挥重要作用，并于1979年主持哈瓦那峰会。
description.en: Cuban revolutionary leader and politician who played a significant role in the Non-Aligned Movement, hosting the Havana summit in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 1979年由菲德尔·卡斯特罗总结的不结盟运动宗旨文件，强调确保成员国的独立、主权、领土完整和安全。
description.en: A document summarizing the purposes of the Non-Aligned Movement, articulated by Fidel Castro in 1979, which emphasizes ensuring the independence, sovereignty, territorial integrity, and security of its member states.

description.zh-cn: 一种通过武力或影响力将权力扩展到其他领土的政策或意识形态，是不结盟运动反对的核心对象之一。
description.en: A policy or ideology of extending power over other territories through force or influence, one of the core concepts opposed by the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 一国获取并维持对另一国或地区的完全或部分政治控制的政策或实践，是不结盟运动反对的核心对象之一。
description.en: The policy or practice of acquiring full or partial political control over another country or area, one of the core concepts opposed by the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 由中国总理周恩来和印度总理尼赫鲁共同倡导的一系列指导国家间关系的原则，后来成为不结盟运动的基础。
description.en: A set of principles to govern relations between states, co-advocated by Chinese Premier Zhou Enlai and Indian Prime Minister Nehru, which later became the foundation of the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理，与尼赫鲁共同倡导和平共处五项原则。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China, who co-advocated the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence with Nehru.

description.zh-cn: 苏联于1979年发动的军事入侵，在不结盟运动内部引发严重分歧，并削弱了古巴的领导地位。
description.en: A military invasion launched by the Soviet Union in 1979, which caused severe divisions within the Non-Aligned Movement and diminished Cuba's leadership role.

description.zh-cn: 不结盟运动成员国，在20世纪70年代发挥了重要的领导作用，但在苏阿战争问题上因支持苏联而声誉受损。
description.en: A member state of the Non-Aligned Movement that played a significant leadership role in the 1970s but whose reputation was damaged by its support for the Soviet Union in the Soviet-Afghan War.

description.zh-cn: 指原南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国在1991年至1992年间解体的事件，影响了不结盟运动，并导致南斯拉夫的成员资格被暂停。
description.en: The event of the dissolution of the former Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia between 1991 and 1992, which affected the Non-Aligned Movement and led to the suspension of Yugoslavia's membership.

description.zh-cn: 不结盟运动的创始成员国之一，在解体后其成员资格被暂停。
description.en: One of the founding members of the Non-Aligned Movement, whose membership was suspended after its breakup.

nodes.id: 联合国安全理事会改革

zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会改革
en: Reform of the United Nations Security Council

description.zh-cn: 旨在重组联合国安理会以提高其代表性和民主性的政治运动，受到不结盟运动的支持。
description.en: A political movement aimed at restructuring the UN Security Council to enhance its representativeness and democracy, supported by the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 乌干达总统，现任不结盟运动主席。
description.en: President of Uganda, current Chairman of the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 在南斯拉夫总统约瑟普·布罗兹·铁托等领导人的倡议下，不结盟运动于1961年在贝尔格莱德正式成立。
description.en: Under the initiative of leaders including Yugoslav President Josip Broz Tito, the Non-Aligned Movement was formally established in Belgrade in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 在印度总理贾瓦哈拉尔·尼赫鲁等领导人的倡议下，不结盟运动于1961年在贝尔格莱德正式成立。
description.en: Under the initiative of leaders including Indian Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru, the Non-Aligned Movement was formally established in Belgrade in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 在埃及总统贾迈勒·阿卜杜-纳赛尔等领导人的倡议下，不结盟运动于1961年在贝尔格莱德正式成立。
description.en: Under the initiative of leaders including Egyptian President Gamal Abdel Nasser, the Non-Aligned Movement was formally established in Belgrade in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 在加纳总统夸梅·恩克鲁玛等领导人的倡议下，不结盟运动于1961年在贝尔格莱德正式成立。
description.en: Under the initiative of leaders including Ghanaian President Kwame Nkrumah, the Non-Aligned Movement was formally established in Belgrade in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 在印度尼西亚总统苏加诺等领导人的倡议下，不结盟运动于1961年在贝尔格莱德正式成立。
description.en: Under the initiative of leaders including Indonesian President Sukarno, the Non-Aligned Movement was formally established in Belgrade in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 不结盟运动的成立是为了在冷战的东西方集团对抗背景下，为发展中国家提供一个独立自主的平台。
description.en: The Non-Aligned Movement was established to provide an independent platform for developing countries amidst the East-West confrontation of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 1955年万隆会议商定的原则为不结盟运动的成立奠定了基础。
description.en: The principles agreed upon at the 1955 Bandung Conference laid the foundation for the establishment of the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 在冷战期间，由苏联领导的东方集团与由美国领导的西方集团处于敌对状态。
description.en: During the Cold War, the Eastern Bloc, led by the Soviet Union, was in a state of hostility with the Western Bloc, led by the United States.

description.zh-cn: 苏联是东方集团的组建者和领导者。
description.en: The Soviet Union was the founder and leader of the Eastern Bloc.

description.zh-cn: 美国是西方集团的组建者和领导者。
description.en: The United States was the founder and leader of the Western Bloc.

description.zh-cn: 不结盟运动的宗旨之一是反对帝国主义。
description.en: One of the tenets of the Non-Aligned Movement is to oppose imperialism.

description.zh-cn: 不结盟运动的宗旨之一是反对殖民主义。
description.en: One of the tenets of the Non-Aligned Movement is to oppose colonialism.

description.zh-cn: 菲德尔·卡斯特罗在1979年的《哈瓦那宣言》中总结了不结盟运动的宗旨。
description.en: Fidel Castro summarized the purposes of the Non-Aligned Movement in the 1979 Havana Declaration.

description.zh-cn: 由周恩来和尼赫鲁倡导的和平共处五项原则后来成为不结盟运动的基础。
description.en: The Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence, advocated by Zhou Enlai and Nehru, later became the foundation of the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来在1954年与尼赫鲁的会谈中共同倡导了和平共处五项原则。
description.en: Zhou Enlai co-advocated the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence during talks with Nehru in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 尼赫鲁在1954年与周恩来的会谈中共同倡导了和平共处五项原则。
description.en: Nehru co-advocated the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence during talks with Zhou Enlai in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 苏联入侵阿富汗事件在不结盟运动内部造成了严重分歧。
description.en: The Soviet invasion of Afghanistan caused serious divisions within the Non-Aligned Movement.

description.zh-cn: 在联合国关于苏联入侵阿富汗的决议中，古巴投票反对谴责苏联，与大多数不结盟运动成员国的立场相悖，显示了其与苏联的紧密关系。
description.en: In the UN resolution regarding the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, Cuba voted against condemning the USSR, contrary to the stance of most Non-Aligned Movement members, indicating its close relationship with the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 创始成员国南斯拉夫的解体影响了不结盟运动，并导致其成员资格于1992年被暂停。
description.en: The breakup of founding member Yugoslavia affected the Non-Aligned Movement, leading to the suspension of its membership in 1992.

relationships.target: 联合国安全理事会改革

description.zh-cn: 不结盟运动倡导联合国安理会改革，以提高发展中国家的代表性和权力。
description.en: The Non-Aligned Movement advocates for the reform of the UN Security Council to enhance the representation and power of developing countries.

description.zh-cn: 不结盟运动批评美国的外交政策，认为其企图践踏小国主权。
description.en: The Non-Aligned Movement criticizes US foreign policy, viewing it as an attempt to undermine the sovereignty of smaller nations.

description.zh-cn: 自2024年起，乌干达总统约韦里·穆塞维尼担任不结盟运动主席。
description.en: Since 2024, Ugandan President Yoweri Museveni has served as the Chairman of the Non-Aligned Movement.
